居.definition: to reside; to be (in a certain position); to store up; to be at a standstill; residence; house; restaurant; classifier for bedrooms

居中.definition: to be between two parties (as in mediation); to be in the middle; to be in between; (page layout) to be centered

居位.definition: to occupy a high position (in administration)

居住.definition: to reside; to dwell; to live in a place; resident in

居功自傲.definition: satisfied with one's accomplishment and arrogant as a result (idiom); resting on one's laurels and despising others

居功至偉.definition: see 厥功至偉|厥功至伟[jue2gong1zhi4wei3]

居安思危.definition: to think of danger in times of safety; to be vigilant in peacetime (idiom)

居官.definition: to secure a position; to take an official appointment

居家.definition: to live at home; to stay at home; home (schooling etc); in-home (care etc); household (repairs etc); living (environment etc)

居庸關.definition: Juyongguan, frontier fortress on Great Wall north of Beijing, in Changping district 昌平區|昌平区[Chang1 ping2 qu1]

居心.definition: to harbor (evil) intentions; to be bent on; a tranquil heart or mind

居心何在.definition: What's (he) up to?; What's the motive behind all this?

居民消費價格指數.pinyin: ju1 min2 xiao1 fei4 jia4 ge2 zhi3 shu4

居民點兒.definition: variant of 居民點|居民点[ju1 min2 dian3]

居無定所.definition: to be without a fixed residence (idiom)

居然.definition: unexpectedly; to one's surprise; go so far as to

居禮夫人.definition: variant of 居里夫人[Ju1li3 fu1ren5]

居經.definition: (TCM) menstruation that comes only once every three months

居酒屋.definition: izakaya (a kind of traditional Japanese pub)

居里夫人.definition: Maria Skłodowska-Curie or Marie Curie (1867-1934), Nobel laureate in both physics (1903) and chemistry (1911)

居間.definition: positioned between (two parties); to mediate between

居首.definition: leading; in first place; top of the list

居高不下.definition: (of prices, rates etc) to remain high

居高臨下.definition: lit. to be in a high location, overlooking the scene below (idiom); fig. to occupy a commanding position; to assume a haughty attitude

居魯士大帝.definition: Cyrus the Great (ca. 600-530 BC), the founder of the Persian Empire and the conqueror of Babylon
